item.title: By: Mark
item.dc:creator: Mark
item.description: Loving the theme & looking forward to updates. Thanks for your work! -- Mark http://mrod411.com/
item.content:encoded:
Loving the theme & looking forward to updates. Thanks for your work!
—
Mark
http://mrod411.com/

item.title: By: Tapeleg
item.dc:creator: Tapeleg
item.description:
Is there a place to add suggestions? I know the theme is supposed to be lightweight, but it's growing in use and scale. Iwould move to see an option to display a title for each post (perhaps some code that is commented out).
But it's still a brilliant theme.
item.content:encoded:
Is there a place to add suggestions? I know the theme is supposed to be lightweight, but it’s growing in use and scale. Iwould move to see an option to display a title for each post (perhaps some code that is commented out).

But it’s still a brilliant theme.

item.title: By: Joseph Scott
item.dc:creator: Joseph Scott
item.description: Work is being done on Prologue to add some of these new features. Hopefully we'll be able to get a release out soon.
item.content:encoded: Work is being done on Prologue to add some of these new features. Hopefully we’ll be able to get a release out soon.

item.title: By: ravishankar
item.dc:creator: ravishankar
item.description:
hi Joseph,
It would be nice if you could help fix this gravatar problem mentioned in http://wordpress.org/support/topic/174995 and also upgrade prologue to exploit new facilities available with WP 2.7 (like comment threading)
thanks
item.content:encoded:
hi Joseph,

It would be nice if you could help fix this gravatar problem mentioned in http://wordpress.org/support/topic/174995 and also upgrade prologue to exploit new facilities available with WP 2.7 (like comment threading)

thanks

item.title: By: Jorge Martinez
item.dc:creator: Jorge Martinez
item.description:
I was wondering what i need to tweak so that i am only able to post content of up to 140 characters?
thanks JM
item.content:encoded:
I was wondering what i need to tweak so that i am only able to post content of up to 140 characters?

thanks
JM

item.title: By: Theo
item.dc:creator: Theo
item.description: I'm not sure if this theme bears such functionality, but is there any way to use it on an integrated phpbb3-WP platform. This platform basically assigns phpbb users a WP account, and thus they can post to the blog. This theme would be perfect as it already features avatar integration and such. Any input would be appreciated.
item.content:encoded: I’m not sure if this theme bears such functionality, but is there any way to use it on an integrated phpbb3-WP platform. This platform basically assigns phpbb users a WP account, and thus they can post to the blog. This theme would be perfect as it already features avatar integration and such. Any input would be appreciated.

item.title: By: Monkeyclaus
item.dc:creator: Monkeyclaus
item.description:
Joseph,
I fixed the problem on my end. I wanted to update you. Turns out the mistake was in the URL I am embarrassed to say. I installed a hplugin in WPMU that allows you to create blog defaults. I just noticed that this plugin is appending blog/ in the permalink of the blog I created and activated Prologue.
In my opinion nothing is wrong with your theme. I'll post this to your blog in that it may help others. Thanks for Prologue it is a THEME which RULES !
@Tapelog how did you hook up the podcasting plugin into this thats RAD
item.content:encoded:
Joseph,

I fixed the problem on my end. I wanted to update you. Turns out the mistake was in the URL I am embarrassed to say. I installed a hplugin in WPMU that allows you to create blog defaults. I just noticed that this plugin is appending blog/ in the permalink of the blog I created and activated Prologue.

In my opinion nothing is wrong with your theme. I’ll post this to your blog in that it may help others. Thanks for Prologue it is a THEME which RULES !

@Tapelog how did you hook up the podcasting plugin into this thats RAD

item.title: By: Tapeleg
item.dc:creator: Tapeleg
item.description:
But that means I have to study!
I'll figure it out.
BTW: My podcasting plugin worked great.
item.content:encoded:
But that means I have to study!

I’ll figure it out.

BTW: My podcasting plugin worked great.

item.title: By: Joseph Scott
item.dc:creator: Joseph Scott
item.description:
@Tapeleg -
You can do you own child theme of Prologue and change it how ever you'd like.
item.content:encoded:
@Tapeleg –

You can do you own child theme of Prologue and change it how ever you’d like.
